thread.title: Richard Ockelton
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Richard Ockelton

author: Richard Ockelton
title: Richard Ockelton
text: I have been really pleased with my purchase from Country Attire. Not only was my jacket a very good price on the site but there was also plenty of choice. It arrived very quickly despite being ordered in the middle of the Christmas holidays! There were also clear instructions and how to return it if it didn't fit. Overall, a very positive experience.
